title: Diversity in Holland
author: VD
content_html:
Someone needs to remind these idiot women protesting the murder of a Dutch girl that they don’t need to “reclaim the night”, they need to reclaim their country and repatriate all the refugees, asylum seekers, and third-worlders to their homelands.

A wave of national fury has swept Holland following the arrest of an asylum seeker for the killing of a 17-year-old who was stabbed to death while she was calling the police to report being followed on her bike ride home.

The lifeless body of Lisa was discovered by police in a roadside ditch in the early hours of Wednesday morning.

She was returning from a night out with friends before she was attacked by a man who also had a bicycle with him, while she was phoning the emergency police number.

The main suspect in the case – a 22-year-old male asylum seeker – was arrested four days ago for a rape in Amsterdam on August 15, and allegedly assaulted a third woman five days earlier.

The violent murder of the teenager has triggered widespread outrage and a nationwide ‘reclaim the night’ campaign, after a Dutch actress and author wrote a poem that went viral about Lisa’s final moments cycling home.

Two observations about the attack:

  • The attacker had already attacked two women and was free despite having been arrested for rape only four days prior.
  • When the girl required police help, they were only 45 minutes away.

This sort of thing is never, ever, going to end so long as Arabs and Africans are permitted to invade and reside in Europe, because it happens all the time in their homelands. That’s a straightforward and undeniable fact, which is why repatriation is a cultural, societal, and moral imperative.

Multiculturalism is a lie, mass immigration is invasion, and different peoples will always have different cultural preferences and mores. And no amount of inversive Enlightenment values and faux moral posturing will ever change that.

DISCUSS ON SG
